Description: Snuff-bottle. Flowers, plant and bat. Made of yellow enamelled ceramic, porcelain.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Rev J W Neligan
Bibliographic references: Franks 1876 / Catalogue of a Collection of Oriental Porcelain and Pottery (p. 61)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Acquisition notes: The date of acquisition is a terminus ante quem derived from the publication date of Franks’ Collection of Oriental Porcelain and Pottery, in which this piece is described.
